page.title: 08Trinity Primary School
page.content:
Trinity School is one of many primary schools. It has children from the ages of four to eleven years. It is a country school built in l854. There is a headmaster and six teachers with about l2O children. The basic subjects are taught daily as well as subjects which include French, Religious Education, Music, Art and Sports.
There is a small outdoor swimming pool 83 cm deep. The children attend school five days a week for five hours daily beginning at 8.55 a.m. and finishing at 3.3O p.m. There is a break for lunch of l.25 hours. During breaktime we play skipping games in the playground. In l985 Trinity and St. Martin's schools combined to visit France and Somerset.
